abstract: New England Brewing Company apologizes after being criticized for putting Mohandas Gandhi's name and image on its Gandhi-Bot India pale ale; Gandhi favored prohibition.
lead_paragraph: The New England Brewing Company apologized for using Mohandas Gandhi’s name and likeness on one of its beers, an India pale ale it calls Gandhi-Bot.
snippet: The New England Brewing Company apologized for using Mohandas Gandhi’s name and likeness on one of its beers, an India pale ale it calls Gandhi-Bot.
